text: Enduring a lot pain with patience is not an easy task but once you master it then you become unstoppable.

text: If you want to know someone closely,Plz do check how he/she talk to his/her parents.whatever the matter if u are not giving respect to ur parnts,you are a trash🚮.Think yourself if one is not polite with parnts then how is he going to be polite with u🙄May Allah give us hidayah🙏

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text:
On this blessed friday,plz don't forget to remember Palestinians in your prayers.we can't even imagine how much they're in pain.Innocent children being killed by terrorist israel.May Allah Almighty bless them with healing and everlasting happiness
#GazaUnderAttack

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text: How can we spend eid with joy and happiness when our brothers and sisters being brutalized by israeli occupying forces.plz make dua for our brothers and sisters.May Allah protect our brothers and sisters in palestine.#IsraeliTerrorism #AqsaUnderAttack https://t.co/0imanF2MKa

text: Seemingly this life looks so beautiful & we all r striving to make it more alluring.But this life is https://t.co/ZdDMWUvqbn day this world will end.what Allah says in Quran"Life of this world is nothing but an illusion".So make efforts to beautify hereafter which is constant. https://t.co/HkCo0ZauwN

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text: Wholeheartedly rely on Allah not people.We all are subordinate,whereas Allah has domination.If you depend on people they will hurt you,break you and make you https://t.co/R9LYHQFjqB Allah Almighty's help,if you are drained.Stand up again with the new hope and live your life.

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text: It doesn't matter what happened in the https://t.co/ABqLEGI4XD have future to go ahead.Stop looking in the past.Stop blaming yourself,just take the lesson from the past and move on.Allah will give you multiple opportunities to reset the mistakes,that you have done in past1/2

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text: Our life is beautifully planned and written by Allah,so keep turning each page with faith and prayer.

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text: Today we are not safe outside of our home and if situation remains the same the day is not far we would feel safe ourselves even at home.we want institutional reforms that ensure our women and children's safety.Incident that happened yesterday is heart wrenching and inhuman1/2

author: Mehran Fazal Rao
text:
Congratulation to all Pakistanis celebrating 73rd independence on 14 august 2020.May Allah bless people of this country with years of prosperity and independence in true sense of word.Ameen
#happyindependencedaypakistan
